Text:
Pleeeeeease seed somebody ,anybody.you can have one of my kidneys if you let me down load this.I have 2 copies of the original ,both with the bonus 12inch but both show tooo much wear to record off of as i wont play scratched records on my turntable at all.
Love this album,saw them live at Finsbury park years ago,huh,STONED that night OR WHAT!!!!
Happy Days,
